topic.title: oxy M30
topic.body: Got some fire M30 blues on deck if anyone is interested. Also some crystal but once l finish with these last few pounds I'm done fucking with it. So its a fire sale on kriss;  20$ a gram. Blues 15$ a pop

1609300485_15K9PA1npTHXojVn5cGqkdM1q1Bfp.body:
> [86tyger420](#comment_2_1PLCs4TjkdZgw81PpfB3jhqgiSic2rSPgJ): interested in your offer, what is your preferred method of sale and delivery?

BC and usps w/tracking and transmitted with pgp
